item.title: Domain 'GatewayAPI' Message Summary
item.author: somebody@somewere.tld (Not Provided)
item.description: Name Users Description Command ‘ActivateMember’ No description provided. Command ‘InactivateMember’ No description provided. Command ‘PurchaseProduct’ On command ImprovingApp.GatewayAPI.DemoScenarioGateway.PurchaseProduct No description provided. Command ‘RegisterMember’ On command ImprovingApp.GatewayAPI.MemberGateway.RegisterMember, On command ImprovingApp.GatewayAPI.MemberGateway.RegisterMember RegisterMember creates a single new member. As this could be a self-service request the OrganizationType is optional. Also registeringMember is optional - if you are registering yourself then you are the registering member for yourself - you just don’t exist yet Command ‘RegisterMemberList’ RegisterMemberList creates multiple members with a single call.

item.title: Glossary Of Terms
item.author: somebody@somewere.tld (Not Provided)
item.description: Term Type Brief Description AccountingContext context – undefined – ActivateMember command – undefined – ActivateMember command Update state of member to Active ActivateOrganization command – undefined – ActivateProduct command – undefined – ActivateTenant command A command that activates a tenant so that operations can be allowed Active enumerator – undefined – Active enumerator – undefined – Active enumerator Tenant is active and suitable for use Active enumerator – undefined – Active state – undefined – Active state – undefined – Active state – undefined – ActiveMemberHandler handler – undefined – ActiveOrganizationHandler handler – undefined – ActiveProductHandler handler – undefined – ActiveProductHandler handler – undefined – ActivePromotionHandler handler – undefined – ActiveState state – undefined – ActiveState record – undefined – ActiveState record – undefined – ActiveTenantHandler handler – undefined – ActiveVendorHandler handler – undefined – AddLiveUpdate command – undefined – AddLocationReservations command – undefined – AddMembersToOrganization command – undefined – AddOwnersToOrganization command – undefined – AddProductsToStore command – undefined – AddVenueLocations command – undefined – Address type A generalized north american postal address Alex author – undefined – AllEventIds result – undefined – AllEventIdsFields record – undefined – AllEventIdsView projector – undefined – AllIdsProjections context – undefined – AllMemberIds result – undefined – AllMemberIdsFields record – undefined – AllMemberIdsView projector – undefined – AllMemberIdsViewHandler handler – undefined – AllOrgIds result – undefined – AllOrgIdsFields record – undefined – AllOrgIdsView projector – undefined – AllOrgIdsViewHandler handler – undefined – AllSkus result – undefined – AllSkusFields record – undefined – AllSkusView projector – undefined – AllSkusViewHandler handler – undefined – AllStoreIds result – undefined – AllStoreIdsFields record – undefined – AllStoreIdsView projector – undefined – AllStoreIdsViewHandler handler – undefined – AllTenantIds result – undefined – AllTenantIdsFields record – undefined – AllTenantIdsView projector – undefined – AllTenantIdsViewHandler handler – undefined – AllTenantIdsViewHandler handler – undefined – Alumni enumerator – undefined – App application The application the user is using to perform this action Application enumerator – undefined – AvailableProductHandler handler – undefined – BillingAccount entity – undefined – BillingContact type – undefined – BookReservation epic – undefined – CAPostalCode type A Canadian Postal Code' Calendars context – undefined – CancelEvent command – undefined – CancelOrder command – undefined – Cancelled state – undefined – Cancelled enumerator – undefined – Cancelled enumerator – undefined – Cancelled state – undefined – CancelledEventHandler handler – undefined – CancelledEventInfo type – undefined – CancelledOrderHandler handler – undefined – CancelledState record – undefined – CancelledState record – undefined – CapacityOverview type – undefined – CapacitySearchHappyPath usecase – undefined – Cart entity – undefined – Catalog entity – undefined – Catalog state – undefined – CatalogHandler handler – undefined – CatalogId type – undefined – CatalogState record – undefined – Category entity – undefined – Category state – undefined – CategoryHandler handler – undefined – CategoryId type – undefined – CategoryState record – undefined – CloseStore command – undefined – Closed enumerator – undefined – Closed state – undefined – Closed enumerator – undefined – Closed state – undefined – Closed enumerator – undefined – Closed state – undefined – ClosedLocation handler – undefined – ClosedState record – undefined – ClosedState record – undefined – ClosedState record – undefined – ClosedStoreHandler handler – undefined – ClosedStoreHandler handler – undefined – ClosedVenue handler – undefined – CommandLine application – undefined – Commerce context – undefined – Contact type Contact information for an individual ContactList type There are three kinds of contacts: Primary Contacts, Billing Contacts, and Distribution Contacts.
